long_description: The men's REI Powerflyte pants offer an active fit, performance fabric and just-right warmth for cool-weather outdoor training activities such as hiking or trail running. Four-way stretch fabric features a moisture-wicking brushed inner face and a smooth, quick-drying outer face. Elastic waistband with adjustable drawcord; small drop-in pocket; flatlock seams; reflective details. Zippered cuffs make it easy to put on the REI Powerflyte pants over shoes or boots. Overstock.
short_description: The men's REI Powerflyte pants offer an active fit, performance fabric and just-right warmth for cool-weather outdoor training activities such as hiking or trail running.
